name: Apply For A Shop License
description: The State Board of Cosmetology and Hairstyling requires that new shops, relocated shops, or shops that have transferred ownership obtain a license with the Department of Consumer Affairs.

destination.name: New Jersey Department of Consumer Affairs

to_complete_must_have: legal structure, business address, opening date, date available for inspection, fire permit, license number of all practitioners, Certificate of Occupancy. A full check list is on the application: https://www.njconsumeraffairs.gov/cos/Applications/Application-for-a-License-to-Operate-a-New-Shop-Relocate-a-Shop-or-to-Transfer-Ownership-of-a-Shop.pdf
